title: California to reopen schools; Biden to pledge $4B to COVAX; Pfizer vaccine can be stored in normal freezer temps: Latest COVID-19 updates
content:
1. California to reopen schools; Biden to pledge $4B to COVAX; Pfizer vaccine can be stored in normal freezer temps: Latest COVID-19 updates  USA TODAY
  2. How Many Vaccine Doses Are Available? US Should See a Surge  Bloomberg
  3. White House announces $4 billion in funding for Covax, the global vaccine effort that Trump spurned  The Washington Post
  4. U.S. won’t share vaccine before all Americans receive shots, officials say  POLITICO
  5. UK PM Boris Johnson to call on G-7 support for 100-day target to develop new vaccines  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 加州将重新开放学校；拜登将向COVAX承诺40亿美元；辉瑞疫苗可在正常冷冻温度下储存。最新的COVID-19更新
